body:
You can become drunk enough where you have lapses in you cognizance, which will subsequently result in gaps in memory. That's what's called being "blackout drunk", and it's not too disimular from what was displayed in this doujin. So, @oldthrashbar, you not personally experiencing this is little more than anecdotal.

I can buy her being too drunk to stand and even her not being fully aware of her surroundings. But, I will admit that her inability to recognize that the man who is fucking her isn't her husband, despite the former looking nothing like the latter, and her not having a moment of clarity where she finds it odd that her husband came to pick her up despite his (in her mind) already having been with her is a little unrealistic.

But, as was stated twice over at the time of my typing this up... It's a fictitious story. We don't have to think too heavily about these things.

It's a plot device, just roll with it... It's in the title pretty much, she's extremely weak to alcohol, wouldn't dig deeper than that. There wouldn't be this and many other doujins without our disbelief suspended. xP
You can't actually become this Retarded right? Maybe she uses it as an excuse  because she loved it so much and definitely wants it to happen again.
@oldthrashbar This is a fantasy made for fapping, not a fictional story based on reality. Dont confuse the two.

I've been drunk. I'm always pretty much myself although with a more sensitive sense of humor. I also remember EVERYTHING. And can think pretty clearly. This is why I can never buy that people actually become retarded like this.
Fuck his wife and he thanks you for it lol
This is wonderful lmao, ntr ftw
Such a helpful boss, calling her husband to pick her up. Such nice and helpful people are rare nowadays.
all hail to arakure sama!!!!! make more chapters arakure!!!!!
@itsme777 - Did she get pregnant by the end of the story?

Hey Can somebody tell me the name of a hentai in which two boys fuck student council president then become her follower or fall for her? The president has a strict personality and long black hair.... cant remember the name of artist and manga...
pentagram you mean cuckedhouse? ayyyyyyyyy see what i did there?
Hot milf only to be sent to the slaughterhouse...
